body:
In this case I think it’s because Luffy hasn’t shown any kind of romantic interest in any women in One Piece, all he cares about is meat and being the pirate king 
Why the artist used Luffy instead of say Sanji is beyond me

why is there so few hentai using the male charactersv in the hetero hentai, like is more comoon to see a blackned figure of creature have sex whit a character thant whit another character, i dont get that.
